Grants

>

Danish Arts Foundation work grant. 2012, 2013, 2015, 2017, 2020, 2021
Jens Ejnar and Johanne Larsens Fond. Travel grant, 2007

Other

>

Founder of Code&Share[ ] and !=null, two public forums for artists, researchers, developers and hackers using contemporary tech for creative expression and aesthetic inquiry.
Founder and editor of ‡ DobbeltDagger, an art publication, distributed by web, printed on paper, made by artists working with contemporary tech 2016.
Co-founder and editor of * [Asterisk], 2002 - 2012.
Member of Kunstnersamfundet.
